description:
Koharu-chan is the girl on the photograph together with http://anidb.net/ch26380 [Yasuna] and http://anidb.net/ch26383 [Yuuma]. It was her who brought Yasuna the message about Yuuma`s death but her exact relation to these two isn`t explained in the anime (she is Yasuna`s childhood friend from elementary school, says the game; her full name Miyasaka Koharu is given only in the game; no dialog lines, no anime credits.)
Which means that she kept Yuuma`s secret about moving to London instead.
name: Koharu-chan
